events.name: Theatre of Violence
events.description: At the age of 9, Dominic Ongwen is abducted by the Ugandan LRA, who train him to be a child soldier and place him in a commanding role. Years later, he now faces the International Criminal Court (ICC), but should he be judged for his actions, or is he himself a victim?  ​​WINNER - Grand Jury Prize Movies That Matter

events.name: Unseen Mini Mornings
events.description: Our Mini Mornings give smaller kids the chance to experience films on the big screen in a child friendly environment with soft lighting levels and lowered film volume. Mini Mornings are run every Sunday morning at 10am with the first edition on Sunday 21 May.

events.name: Clash of Shujaa
events.description: Clash of Shujaa will be a live music event featuring Black Metal band: Chovu Band and grunge icons: Petrika Band. Chovu is a 4 piece metal band that incorporates theatrics based on mysticism and native lore that make their performances a very eccentric experience

events.name: Digitisation Forum for MSMEs
events.description: The forum explores and promotes the digitization of Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) in Kenya. It seeks to provide a platform for knowledge sharing, collaboration, and capacity building to empower MSMEs to leverage digital technologies for growth and sustainability.
